content.text: Match ends, América 0, Real Madrid 2.
Second Half ends, América 0, Real Madrid 2.
Offside, América. Rubens Sambueza tries a through ball, but Oribe Peralta is caught offside.
Goal!  América 0, Real Madrid 2. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by James Rodríguez.
Nacho (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Nacho (Real Madrid).
